skill.name: sword.military.company.skills.Lead
skill.description: For the company commander, to perform a mission by issuing sub-tasks to subordinates.

parameter.name: mainTasks
parameter.description: The main task to be performed by first echelon units.

parameter.name: supportTasks
parameter.description: The task to be performed by second echelon units, a the begining of the company mission ('sword.military.platoon.tasks.Follow' for instance). This mission is issued to second echelon units ready to support the fist echelon units.

parameter.name: pcTasks
parameter.description: The task to be performed by the command post.

parameter.name: peiTasks
parameter.description: The task to be performed by the scouting units.

parameter.name: engineerTask
parameter.description: The task to be performed by engineer units.

parameter.name: defaultTask
parameter.description: The task to be performed by units that cannot perform the main task or the support task ('sword.military.platoon.tasks.MoveAlong'or 'sword.military.platoon.tasks.Follow'missions for instance).

parameter.name: taskForSupporting
parameter.description: The mission to be performed by second echelon units in case the first echelon needs support (the first echelon have bad force ratio or are under attack). In offensive mission the task could be 'sword.military.platoon.coercition.tasks.CombatSupport' for instance.

parameter.name: noCoordination
parameter.description: Define if the agent uses coordination. Depending on the company mission, the coodination can be enable or disabled.

parameter.name: allInFront
parameter.description: Define if all subodinate units should by as part of the first echelon.

parameter.name: withPC
parameter.description: Define if the command post unit of the company should receive a task. If it is set to 'False', the command post of the company won't receive any mission (it stays on its current position).

parameter.name: disableWhenDone
parameter.description: Define if the skill returns a feedback when all subordinate units have ended their respective missions. If this skill is used by the main skill within a task, the task will end once this feeback is sent.

parameter.name: manageAddedAndDeletedUnits
parameter.description: Define is the company leader has to manage dynamic reinforcement (new platoon are added to or removed from the company). If it is set to true, new platoons will receive a mission as soon they are added to the company.

link.name: supportManager
link.description: To manage the decision of issuing support tasks to the second echelon units.

link.name: coordinationManager
link.description: To manage the decision of coordinate the different echelons of the company.

link.name: relieveManager
link.description: Manage the decision of releiving destroyed units of the first echelon (a unit of the second echelon will be choose to releive a destroyed unit of the first echelon).

link.name: AssignSETask
link.description: To manage the decision of issuing tasks to the second echelon units.

link.name: synchronizeRC
link.description: To manage reports sent to gaming interfaces. Those reports depend on the behaviors of the units subordinate to the company.
